title: Serif used in Die Zeit Wissen Ratgeber
content:
Hi,  
Reading Zeit Wissen I was marvelling at how beautiful Publico is until I realized that it's not Publico.  
Sorry for the poor image quality, but it's late and I need to know what this Serif is or I won't sleep tonight…

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015114259im_/http:/typophile.com/files/uso_6139.jpg)
author: Fredrik

comments.content:
It looks like **[Utopia Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015114259/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Utopia-Black%20-%20Black%20Bold&fid=0ef66cc2a371fb1f1ea58be4b599b204&fsize=60&text=Die%20Angst%20vor%20Subigkeiten%20fuhrt%20dazu%2C&wrap=2)** by Robert Slimbach (Adobe, 1989),  
so I suppose you can sleep tight now ;)

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015114259/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
